entry.def: To launch a rocket, missile, or satellite means to send it into the air or into space.

example.ex: NASA plans to launch a satellite to study cosmic rays...
example.tran: 美国国家航空航天局计划发射一颗卫星上天，对宇宙射线进行研究。

example.ex: A Delta II rocket was launched from Cape Canaveral early this morning.
example.tran: 今天一早，一枚“德尔塔”Ⅱ型火箭在卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

entry.tran: 使（船）下水；使（新船）首次下水
entry.def: To launch a ship or a boat means to put it into water, often for the first time after it has been built.

example.ex: There was no time to launch the lifeboats because the ferry capsized with such alarming speed.
example.tran: 渡轮瞬间倾覆，根本没时间放救生艇下水。

entry.tran: 开展（重大活动）；发起，发动（军事袭击等）
entry.def: To launch a large and important activity, for example a military attack, means to start it.

example.ex: Heavy fighting has been going on after the guerrillas had launched their offensive...
example.tran: 游击队发起攻击后，激烈的战斗一直持续不断。

example.ex: The police have launched an investigation into the incident...
example.tran: 警方已对该事件展开调查。

entry.def: If a company launches a new product, it makes it available to the public.

example.ex: Crabtree & Evelyn has just launched a new jam, Worcesterberry Preserve...
example.tran: 瑰珀翠刚推出一款新果酱——伍斯特浆果果酱。

example.ex: Marks & Spencer recently hired model Linda Evangelista to launch its new range.
example.tran: 玛莎百货最近聘请模特儿琳达·埃万杰利斯塔为其发布新系列产品。

entry.tran: （在江河、湖泊和港口载人的）大型汽艇
entry.def: A launch is a large motorboat that is used for carrying people on rivers and lakes and in harbours.

example.ex: The captain was on the deck of the launch, steadying the boat for the pilot...
example.tran: 船长站在汽艇甲板上为领航员保向。

example.ex: We'll make a trip by launch to White Island.
example.tran: 我们将乘汽艇到怀特岛。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of moving a newly-built vessel into the water for the first time
2. the act of beginning something new;

sentences.sentence: "they looked forward to the debut of their new product line"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of propelling with force

sentences.en: We got a fix on the missile launching site.

sentences.en: The rocket lifted off from its launching pad.
sentences.cn: 火箭从它的发射台上发射而出。

sentences.en: She was fascinated at the spectacle of a rocket launching.
sentences.cn: 她被发射火箭的壮观场面强烈地吸引住了。

sentences.en: This is not a suitable time for launching forth on a new business undertaking.
sentences.cn: 现在,不宜着手搞新的经营项目。
